MACRO_CHECK_SHOULD_BUILD(nedmalloc)

IF(nedmalloc_SHOULD_BUILD)

  SET(nedmalloc_DEFINITIONS "-DREPLACE_SYSTEM_ALLOCATOR" )
  MESSAGE(STATUS "nedmalloc_DEFINITIONS=${nedmalloc_DEFINITIONS}")
  ADD_DEFINITIONS("${nedmalloc_DEFINITIONS}")
  INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES("${IZENELIB_SOURCE_DIR}/include/3rdparty/memory/nedmalloc")

  MACRO_ADD_LIBRARY(nedmalloc SRCS "nedmalloc.c")

ENDIF(nedmalloc_SHOULD_BUILD)
